content.rendered:
Chess Online : Play Master Chess Multiplayer

Play Master Chess Online on your desktop and mobile phone for free. Master Chess is an online chess game with single and multiplayer options.

Play Free Chess vs computer or a friend . Enjoy this stylish version of the classic Chess Game with 3 Game’s Mode: : Multiplayer mode , Play against the pc -and Challenge a friend playing on the same device.

Play Chess Online for FREE with Friends

Chess is a board game played between two players.

It is sometimes called Western chess or international chess to distinguish it from related games such as xiangqi and shogi. The current form of the game emerged in Spain and the rest of Southern Europe during the second half of the 15th century after evolving from chaturanga, a similar but much older game of Indian origin.

Today, chess is one of the world’s most popular games, played by millions of people worldwide.

Chess Pieces

When learning the game of chess, there is no place more important to begin than with the pieces.
we learn about all of the pieces—specifically, where they are placed when a game begins, how they move, and how they are valued.

The chess pieces are what you move on a chessboard when playing a game of chess. There are six different types of chess pieces. Each side starts with 16 pieces: eight pawns, two bishops, two knights, two rooks, one queen, and one king. Let’s meet them!

How to Play Chess
